newsArray.title: Virat Kohli Scores His 54th One-Day International Hundred, Slams 91-Ball Ton During IND vs NZ 3rd ODI 2026
newsArray.description: Cashing in on his excellent form of late, Virat Kohli scored his 54th One-Day International hundred during the ongoing IND vs NZ 3rd ODI 2026. Kohli reached his 54th ODI ton off 90 balls, laced with eight fours and two sixes.

newsArray.title: Turkiye’s Zeynep Sonmez helps ball girl after fainting, kind act wins hearts at Australian Open – WATCH
